title: Scrabble Orginal Y9592 Board Game
short_description: Scrabble is the classic word-forming game that always spells fun The object of the game is to earn the highest score by spelling words in crossword fashion onto the playing board, each player selects seven letter tiles at random to begin Scores are given for letter values and boosted by premium squares on the grid Scrabble game is not only fun but will improve your vocabulary as each time you play you are introduced to and exciting words Includes one scrabble game board, hundred letter tiles, four racks, a letter bag and instructions  See more product details
